name: Endless Journey (Martin Mauersics)
description:
Roll around in circles, try to reach the top, fall back to the bottom, and never give up.

Endless Journey is a spiritual arcade climber made in less than sixteen hours on two Mi'pu'mi days with the jam theme "slippery slope".

InputActionWASD | Arrows
Move ⇄ | Jump Up ↑ | Jump Down ↓
Stick
Move ⇄Left Mouse Button | Gamepad A
Jump Up ↑
Right Mouse Button | Gamepad B
Jump Down ↓

Music:
by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?genre=Electronica)
